title: Shell Script - 101
description: Introduction to Shell Script. This course is intended for whom may have interest in knowing a new Linux and powerful scripting language, and being able to manage almost a whole trough it

courses.title: Shell Script - Hello World!
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how create you first Shell Script file.

courses.title: Shell Script - Variables
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to work in variables in Shell Scripting.

courses.title: Shell Script - Linux Commands
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to include Shell Commands to your scripts.

courses.title: Shell Script - Decisions
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to work with 3 decisions structures: IF/ELSE, ELIF and CASE.

courses.title: Shell Script - Repeat
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to work with 3 loops structures: FOR, WHILE and UNTIL/DO.

courses.title: Shell Script - Error Management
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to handle errors that can possible happen while your script is running.

courses.title: Shell Script - Functions
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to organize your script in functions.

courses.title: Shell Script - Nested Scripting
courses.description: In this topic you will learn how to call another Shell Script inside your Shell Script

courses.title: Shell Script - Final Challenge
courses.description: Time to test your knowledge acquired in the lessons behind!
